original_text: A wild ox is very strong. But you cannot trust it to help you with your difficult work. A wild ox is very strong.
korean_text: 그것이 힘이 세다고 네가 그것을 의지하겠느냐 네 수고를 그것에게 맡기겠느냐

sentences.original_text: A wild ox is very strong.

sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 당신은 그것을 믿을 수 없습니다

sentences.original_text: to help you with your difficult work.
A wild ox is very strong.
